name: Nibeos
summary:
Have you ever entered the L o s t t i m e beyond midnight? Have you ever felt the wind on an empty dark street? Have you ever climbed dark branches between the buildings of humankind? If you have perhaps you already know Nibeos, now hear the story of that place.

Experience a visual novel created entirely in paint and shadow, touch the horror of the depths of the sable time, drink in the dark jazz of the empty streets, soak in the atmosphere of the city, in summer, at night.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: NIBEOS, A VISUAL NOVEL, COMING SOON...
